channel.title: Getting Started on Orange Academy
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on Orange Academy

item.title: Node JS: An Introduction
item.description: Learning Objectives Concepts Explain what Node.js is & why it exists Compare synchronous and asynchronous code execution Explain the advantages of asynchronous I/O Skills Write a simple JavaScript program and execute it with Node.

item.title: CLI Tutorial
item.description: Learning Objectives Concepts The ability to follow online tutorials and documentation is essential to the modern software engineer.

item.title: CLI Project Ideas
item.description: Project Guidelines You will build a command line application using Node. Below you will find a list of project ideas and requirements for each app.
